greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows which arises from A195832, in the same way as A175003 arises from A195310. Column k starts at row A195162(k).
comment: The sum of terms of row n is equal to the leftmost term of row n+1. This sequence is related to the generalized dodecagonal numbers A195162, A195832 and A195852 in the same way as A175003 is related to the generalized pentagonal numbers A001318, A195310 and A000041. See comments in A195825.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Sep 24 2011
